msContents.summary:
The manuscript is a commentary on the epic Rāmāyaṇa. The commentary written by Mudigonda Hari . According to New Catalogus Catalogorum the title of the commetary is Vālmikibhāva or bhāvaprakāśikā . This is an incomplete manuscript. 2 folio with list some random verses from Ayodhyākāṇḍa, Araṇyakāṇḍa at the beginning and kiśkindhākāṇḍa, sundarkāṇḍa at the end. The beggining of the manuscript of the Rāmāyaṇa with the Viṣrusahasranāma verses is a typical feature of the Southern tradition of the Rāmāyaṇa. support.p: Front cover is broken. Supported by the attaching thin palm leaf.

extent.measure: 2 guard folios, 55 written and 2 blank folios and 2 folios with list of random verses from different parts of the chapters.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil numerals in the left corner. 1-54 folio are numbered. Last folio is not numbered.
supportDesc.condition: Some folio are broken at the edges. Few wormholes.

handNote.desc: Handwriting is not very legible, cluster words are difficult to read.
